    • createService

      public io.fabric8.kubernetes.api.model.Service createService​(ServiceInfo info)
      Create a Service using the specified info. NOTE on Limits and Request: Requests are what the container is guaranteed to get. If a container Requests a resource, Kubernetes will only schedule it on a node that can give it that resource. Limits, make sure a container never goes above a certain value. The container is only allowed to go up to the limit, and then it is restricted. CPU is specified in millicores and Memory is specified in Bytes.
      Parameters:
      info - Service Specification.
      Returns:
      Service created.

    • findServices

      public io.fabric8.kubernetes.api.model.ServiceList findServices​(java.lang.String namespace, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> labels)
      Find Services based on matching Labels.
      Parameters:
      namespace - Name Space to search, if null returns from all Name Spaces
      labels - Labels to search for
      Returns:
      a ServicesList

    • deleteDeployment

      public boolean deleteDeployment​(java.lang.String serviceName, java.lang.String namespace)
      Delete a Deployment using the specified info.
      Parameters:
      serviceName - Service as a Name to delete
      namespace - Deployment in the namepace to delete
      Returns:
      True if OK else False if deletion failed

    • execCommand

      public java.lang.String execCommand​(java.lang.String podName, java.lang.String namespace, java.lang.String command, boolean waitForPod)
      Execute a command in a desired Pod
      Parameters:
      podName - The name of the Pod
      namespace - The namespace for the Pod
      command - Bash command(s) to run, if multiple commands they need to follow Bash conventions and separate with && or ||
      waitForPod - True if need to wait for Pod to be in a running state first
      Returns:
      Standard Output from Exec Command

    • copyFileToPod

      public boolean copyFileToPod​(java.lang.String podName, java.lang.String namespace, java.io.File fileToUpload, java.lang.String podPath)
      Copy a File to a desired Pod.
      Parameters:
      podName - Pod to copy to
      namespace - In this namespace
      fileToUpload - File to upload to Pod
      podPath - At this path in the Pod
      Returns:
      True if OK
